ygData.subject: How to remove yourself from this list.
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to www.onelist.com then click on my onelist (assuming you have already logged in or you have the remember who I am option set. you will see a screen that
ygData.messageBody:
Go to www.onelist.com then click on my onelist (assuming you have already logged in or you have the "remember who I am" option set. you will see a screen that lists all the forums you subscribe to. Go to EQ-Tinkering and click the pulldown menu and click Unsubscribe and then click Update/OK (I forget the name of the button) and it will remove you from the list. You need to have your cookies turned ON for this to work they are already on in any browser and if you turned them off just do the same thing you did to turn them off and turn them back on. Hope you have better luck with other skills in the future.
-----Original Message-----
From: Logan Davis <necro@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, December 05, 1999 4:30 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Remove me from EQ_Tinkering


Please remove me, thats all. Thanks
